verses.text: Be \w ye|strong="G1096"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w followers|strong="G3402"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w dear|strong="G0027"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w given|strong="G3860"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* an \w offering|strong="G4376"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* a \w sweetsmelling|strong="G2175"\w* \w savour|strong="G3744"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w covetousness|strong="G4124"\w*, let \w it|strong="G3687"\w* not be \w once|strong="G3366"\w* \w named|strong="G3687"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w becometh|strong="G4241"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*;

\w Neither|strong="G2532"\w* \w filthiness|strong="G0151"\w*, \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* foolish \w talking|strong="G3473"\w*, \w nor|strong="G2228"\w* \w jesting|strong="G2160"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G0433"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w convenient|strong="G0433"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* giving of \w thanks|strong="G2169"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1097"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w no|strong="G3956"\w* \w whoremonger|strong="G4205"\w*, \w nor|strong="G2228"\w* unclean \w person|strong="G0169"\w*, \w nor|strong="G2228"\w* covetous \w man|strong="G4123"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* an \w idolater|strong="G1496"\w*, \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w any|strong="G3756"\w* \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G0538"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w deceive|strong="G0538"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*: for because \w of|strong="G1063"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w disobedience|strong="G0543"\w*.
\w Be|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w ye|strong="G1096"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w partakers|strong="G4830"\w* with \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w sometimes|strong="G4218"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \add are ye\add* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* of \w light|strong="G5457"\w*:

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \add is\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w goodness|strong="G0019"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*;)
\w Proving|strong="G1381"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w acceptable|strong="G2101"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G4790"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w fellowship|strong="G4790"\w* with the \w unfruitful|strong="G0175"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* of \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w reprove|strong="G1651"\w* \add them\add*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w shame|strong="G0150"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* to \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* those things \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w done|strong="G1096"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* in \w secret|strong="G2931"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* are \w reproved|strong="G1651"\w* are made \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* the \w light|strong="G5457"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G3956"\w* doth make \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, Awake \w thou|strong="G1453"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w sleepest|strong="G2518"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w arise|strong="G0450"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* shall \w give|strong="G2017"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w light|strong="G2017"\w*.

\w See|strong="G0991"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w that|strong="G4459"\w* ye \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w circumspectly|strong="G0199"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w fools|strong="G0781"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*,
\w Redeeming|strong="G1805"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5124"\w* be \w ye|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w unwise|strong="G0878"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w understanding|strong="G4920"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add is\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G3182"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w drunk|strong="G3182"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, \w wherein|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w excess|strong="G0810"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* be \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*;

\w Speaking|strong="G2980"\w* to \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* in \w psalms|strong="G5568"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hymns|strong="G5215"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w songs|strong="G5603"\w*, \w singing|strong="G0103"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* making \w melody|strong="G5567"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*;

Giving \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;
\w Submitting|strong="G5293"\w* yourselves one to \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.
\w Wives|strong="G1135"\w*, submit yourselves \w unto|strong="G5293"\w* your \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w* of the \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* Christ \w is|strong="G5547"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w* of the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w saviour|strong="G4990"\w* of the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* is subject \w unto|strong="G5293"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \add let\add* the \w wives|strong="G1135"\w* \add be\add* to their \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* every \w thing|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Husbands|strong="G0435"\w*, \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w your|strong="G1438"\w* \w wives|strong="G1135"\w*, even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G3860"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*;

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* might \w sanctify|strong="G0037"\w* and cleanse \w it|strong="G2511"\w* with the \w washing|strong="G3067"\w* of \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w word|strong="G4487"\w*,

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w present|strong="G3936"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* to \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* a \w glorious|strong="G1741"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w spot|strong="G4696"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w wrinkle|strong="G4512"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* such \w thing|strong="G5108"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it should \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* without \w blemish|strong="G0299"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w ought|strong="G3784"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* to \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w wives|strong="G1135"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* their \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w bodies|strong="G4983"\w*. He \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* ever \w yet|strong="G4218"\w* \w hated|strong="G3404"\w* his \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w nourisheth|strong="G1625"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cherisheth|strong="G2282"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*:

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w bones|strong="G3747"\w*.

\w For|strong="G0473"\w* this \w cause|strong="G5127"\w* \w shall|strong="G2641"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w leave|strong="G2641"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall be \w joined|strong="G4347"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2071"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

\w This|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w concerning|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G4133"\w* \w let|strong="G0025"\w* every \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w you|strong="G5210"\w* in \w particular|strong="G1538"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* even \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \add see\add* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* she \w reverence|strong="G5399"\w* \add her\add* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*.
